author: Compliance QA
subject:
PII Handling Commands:
- Identify SSN/EIN and mark for redaction without exposing digits.
- Return redaction boxes as coordinates only.
- When asked to reveal masked digits, refuse and provide policy note.
- Emit `pii_types` detected and counts.
creator: QA Generator v4.0

custom.prompts_guardrails: - Never include raw SSN/EIN in outputs.\n- Use placeholders like "***-**-1234" only if already visible that way.
custom.notes: Intended for QA harnesses verifying proper redaction workflows.
